mapper.insert: insert into db_productalert (SQUENCEID, ALERTSTAR1, ALERTEND1, ALERTSTATIC1, ALERTSTAR2, ALERTEND2, ALERTSTATIC2, ALERTSTAR3, ALERTEND3, ALERTSTATIC3) values (#{squenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alertstar1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{alertend1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{alertstatic1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{alertstar2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{alertend2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{alertstatic2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{alertstar3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{alertend3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{alertstatic3,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update db_productalert set ALERTSTAR1 = #{alertstar1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ALERTEND1 = #{alertend1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ALERTSTATIC1 = #{alertstatic1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ALERTSTAR2 = #{alertstar2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ALERTEND2 = #{alertend2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ALERTSTATIC2 = #{alertstatic2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ALERTSTAR3 = #{alertstar3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ALERTEND3 = #{alertend3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ALERTSTATIC3 = #{alertstatic3,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where SQUENCEID = #{squenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SQUENCEID, ALERTSTAR1, ALERTEND1, ALERTSTATIC1, ALERTSTAR2, ALERTEND2, ALERTSTATIC2, ALERTSTAR3, ALERTEND3, ALERTSTATIC3 from db_productalert where SQUENCEID = #{squenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SQUENCEID, ALERTSTAR1, ALERTEND1, ALERTSTATIC1, ALERTSTAR2, ALERTEND2, ALERTSTATIC2, ALERTSTAR3, ALERTEND3, ALERTSTATIC3 from db_productalert
